title: Tracker
description: Jason is unlike any other eighteen year old. A street kid with special abilities, his only contact with authority is Detective Alice Farrow. Whenever Alice needs help with difficult cases, she enlists Jason as an informant while attempting to keep his abilities secret. When Trevor Mason--one of the city's most notorious criminals--does the unthinkable, Alice and her partner must prevent Jason from becoming a tool of destruction. Can they rescue Jason before his full power is unleashed?
author: Adrianne Lemke
